mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT NO, NAME FROM ITEM_CATEGORY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRADE(NO, BOARD_NO, ITEM_CATEGORY, ADDRESS_NO, STATUS_NO ,PRICE) VALUES (TRADE_NO_SEQ.nextval, BOARD_NO_SEQ.currval, #{itemCategory}, #{addressNo}, #{statusNo}, #{price})
INSERT INTO IMAGE(NO, TRADE_NO, FILENAME, FILEPATH) VALUES (IMAGE_NO_SEQ.nextval, TRADE_NO_SEQ.currval, #{filename}, #{filepath})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, R.* FROM (SELECT T.NO TRADE_NO, ITEM_CATEGORY, T.ADDRESS_NO, T.BUYER_NO, STATUS_NO, PRICE, B.NO BOARD_NO, B.MEMBER_NO MEMBER_NO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.CREATE_DATE, B.MODIFIED_DATE, HIT, B.DEL_FLAG, M.NO, M.NICKNAME, I.NAME ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME, A.SIDO_NAME, A.SIGUNGU_NAME, A.DONG_NAME, IMG.FILENAME, IMG.FILEPATH FROM TRADE T, BOARD B, MEMBERS M, ITEM_CATEGORY I, ADDRESS A, IMAGE IMG WHERE T.BOARD_NO = B.NO AND B.MEMBER_NO = M.NO AND T.ITEM_CATEGORY = I.NO AND T.ADDRESS_NO = A.NO AND T.NO = IMG.TRADE_NO AND B.DEL_FLAG = 'N' ORDER BY T.NO DESC) R) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 10

SELECT T.NO TRADE_NO, ITEM_CATEGORY, T.ADDRESS_NO, T.BUYER_NO, STATUS_NO, PRICE, B.NO BOARD_NO, B.MEMBER_NO MEMBER_NO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.CREATE_DATE, B.MODIFIED_DATE, HIT, B.DEL_FLAG, M.NO, M.NICKNAME, I.NAME ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME, A.SIDO_NAME, A.SIGUNGU_NAME, A.DONG_NAME, IMG.FILENAME, IMG.FILEPATH FROM TRADE T, BOARD B, MEMBERS M, ITEM_CATEGORY I, ADDRESS A, IMAGE IMG WHERE T.BOARD_NO = B.NO AND B.MEMBER_NO = M.NO AND T.ITEM_CATEGORY = I.NO AND T.ADDRESS_NO = A.NO AND T.NO = IMG.TRADE_NO AND TRADE_NO = #{no}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, R.* FROM (SELECT T.NO TRADE_NO, ITEM_CATEGORY, T.ADDRESS_NO, T.BUYER_NO, STATUS_NO, PRICE, B.NO BOARD_NO, B.MEMBER_NO MEMBER_NO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.CREATE_DATE, B.MODIFIED_DATE, HIT, B.DEL_FLAG, M.NO, M.NICKNAME, I.NAME ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME, A.SIDO_NAME, A.SIGUNGU_NAME, A.DONG_NAME, IMG.FILENAME, IMG.FILEPATH FROM TRADE T, BOARD B, MEMBERS M, ITEM_CATEGORY I, ADDRESS A, IMAGE IMG, FAVORITE F WHERE T.BOARD_NO = B.NO AND B.MEMBER_NO = M.NO AND T.ITEM_CATEGORY = I.NO AND T.ADDRESS_NO = A.NO AND T.NO = IMG.TRADE_NO AND F.TRADE_NO = T.NO AND B.DEL_FLAG = 'N' AND F.OWNER_NO = 1 ORDER BY T.NO DESC) R) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 10
